title: Why is Morellos an essential item on Taliyah now?
body:
In the last patch, Riot changed the cooldown of her Q and worked ground, and suddenly Morellos is an essential item on her?

I dont really see how though, so I'm afraid i might be missing something. 

She isn't mana hungry, especially with a RoA. Her coolodowns have never been a problem (especially after Riot just lowered them), and she isn't a champion like Syndra who needs CDR asap. The passive on Morellos is also very situational, and is far from essential on her kit the way it would be on other mages. 

So whats the reason for it suddenly being a core item on her? There must be a reason, but i just am wondering what it is, and why Morellos is recommended over Items like RoA, Rylais and Lyandries, which are all perfect for her. 

Someone please let me in on the know xD
